entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain in the evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight except a few flurries over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
